name: Grow to Space
description:
How far can you grow?

You are a weed that is growing uncontrollably, constantly losing water. Choose the path of your growth and come up with your own strategy- conserve your boost to save more water, or dart from raindrop to raindrop as fast as you can! Travel through 4 unique regions, each one more difficult than the one before. Defy all odds and grow to outer space!
